db:select.db:sql: SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate FROM Account WHERE Name = :name

SELECT Name, AccountNumber,BillingCity,BillingCountry,BillingPostalCode, Description, LastModifiedDate, NumberOfEmployees, Phone, Type FROM Account WHERE LastModifiedDate > :lastUpdate AND LastModifiedById != :lastModifiedById ORDER BY LastModifiedDate ASC

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map { Name: $.Name default "", AccountNumber: $.AccountNumber default "", BillingCity: $.BillingCity default "", BillingCountry: $.BillingCountry default "", BillingPostalCode: $.BillingPostalCode default "", Description: $.Description default "", LastModifiedDate: $.LastModifiedDate as String, NumberOfEmployees: $.NumberOfEmployees default 0, Phone: $.Phone default "", Type: $.Type default "" }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { Type: payload01.Type, Description: payload01.Description, BillingCountry: payload01.BillingCountry, BillingCity: payload01.BillingCity, Phone: payload01.Phone, BillingPostalCode: payload01.BillingPostalCode, NumberOfEmployees: if(payload01.NumberOfEmployees != null) payload01.NumberOfEmployees as String else null, AccountNumber: payload01.AccountNumber, Name: payload01.Name }
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- [{ id: null, errorMessage : error.detailedDescription, status : "Failed" }]
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map { id : $ , status : "Success" }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { Type: payload01.Type, Description: payload01.Description, BillingCountry: payload01.BillingCountry, BillingCity: payload01.BillingCity, Phone: payload01.Phone, BillingPostalCode: payload01.BillingPostalCode, NumberOfEmployees: if(payload01.NumberOfEmployees != null) payload01.NumberOfEmployees as String else null, Id: payload01.Id, AccountNumber: payload01.AccountNumber, Name: payload01.Name }

db:bulk-update.doc:name: Bulk update
db:bulk-update.db:sql: UPDATE Account SET AccountNumber = :AccountNumber, Name = :Name,Description = :Description,NumberOfEmployees = :NumberOfEmployees,Type = :Type, Phone = :Phone, BillingCity = :BillingCity, BillingCountry = :BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode = :BillingPostalCode, LastModifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),LastModifiedById = CURRENT_USER() WHERE Id = :Id

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- [{ id: null, errorMessage : error.detailedDescription, status : "Failed" }]
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map { id : $, status : "Success" }
